name: Skyz Vinyl Sauna Suit Wholesale (1,000pc) -Box Packaging/Silver Suit
description:
About the product:

Skyz Vinyl Sauna Suit 2-piece heavy-duty vinyl suit retains body heat. Valeo Vinyl Sauna Suit top features a 3-snap pocket closure, chest pocket and reflective striped sleeves for improved visibility. Skyz Vinyl Sauna Suit Pant features elastic waist and cuffs. It is generously sized for easy movement and wipes clean with damp cloth. Clean with warm, soapy water and soft cloth

Sauna suits are used for weight loss and conditioning by professional athletes, amateur athletes and enthusiasts. Typically, these suits are made from rubberized vinyl, which is able to hold up (not tear) under the stress of active sports.

Good sauna suits allow you to quickly begin sweating and sweat for longer periods of time. Sweating will help your body lose water and toxins that are in the water. Because you are sweating a lot with saunas suits, it is critical to be careful in order not to become dehydrated. Remember your body is burning calories when you wear a sauna suit, so you can drink water to keep yourself hydrated. The key to losing weight is to burn more calories then you are taking in. The sauna suit will increase the amount of calories you are burning therefore helping you to lose weight.

In summary, a sauna suit is a good, and inexpensive, alternative to purchasing or using a traditional sauna. If used with care, it can be a great addition to anyone's workout routine. Remember this will only help you to lose weight.

----

Packaging & Delivery:

Different Packaging Details:	
Packaging one: Poly Bag 
Packaging Two: White Box 
Packaging Three: Color Box

Delivery Detail:	
25 Days

Specifications
Sauna Suit 
Sauna wear,comfortable,fashionable 
1.PVC sauna suit 
2.Size:S,M,L,XL,XXL *Delivered Assorted!
3.Color:Black or Silver 

100% PVC Sauna suit
 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Material : 100% pvc
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Packaging : 
Color box
  
Moq:
750  sets/size/color --- Color Box packaging
1000 sets/size/color --- Color box packaging
 
Please allow Lead Time: 15 DAYS ( Delivery Time of up to: 25 DAYS)

Sample Profits:

Your cost including shipping and private label design= $12,950
1,000pcs x Recommended MSRP Price ($39.99) = 39,950
Profit of = $27,000
